Grumpy Witcher
MOD: Grumpy Witcher
MOD: Grumpy Witcher
text
Do I really have to decide this right now?
Well, since we are both here anyway..
You know I'm not here for this.
What a wonderful place, don't you think? Calm, picturesque, lovely maidens - a small isle in this cruel land
Mmhh. Aside from the wild bears and white wolfs hunting the villagers, the hard winters and poor medical care... it surely is.
Ahhh. Do you always have to-
Yes. You're idealistic dreamings will ruin you're life one day. Mind my words.
Well, I can't be bothered for sure. Now, will you help me?
Do I really have to decide this right now?
Yes, of course old man!
You know I'm not here for this. I will not get involved in your doings this time.
Alright. The grumpy witcher is in a bad mood. You know this doesn't fare well with the ladies, don't you?
Well, since we are both here anyway.. Surely a short detour won't cost me much time.
Ha! Knew I could count on you. You'll get a hefty reward, I promise!
Don't make any fast promises, Dandelion...
